title: Awesome List Updates on Sep 27, 2021

items.title: Public Apis
items.content_text:
### Anime

- API: [MangaDex](https://api.mangadex.org/docs.html)

  Description: Manga Database and Community

  Auth: `apiKey`

  HTTPS: Yes

  CORS: Unknown
items.content_html:
Anime

  • API: MangaDex

    Description: Manga Database and Community

    Auth: apiKey

    HTTPS: Yes

    CORS: Unknown

items.title: Awesome Machine Learning
items.content_text:
### Python / Computer Vision

*   [Exadel CompreFace (‚≠ê6.5k)](https://github.com/exadel-inc/CompreFace) - face recognition system that can be easily integrated into any system without prior machine learning skills. CompreFace provides REST API for face recognition, face verification, face detection, face mask detection, landmark detection, age, and gender recognition and is easily deployed with docker.
items.content_html:
Python / Computer Vision

  • Exadel CompreFace (‚≠ê6.5k) - face recognition system that can be easily integrated into any system without prior machine learning skills. CompreFace provides REST API for face recognition, face verification, face detection, face mask detection, landmark detection, age, and gender recognition and is easily deployed with docker.

items.title: Awesome Crystal
items.content_text:
### Internationalization

*   [Rosetta (‚≠ê43)](https://github.com/wout/rosetta) - A blazing fast internationalization (i18n) library with compile-time key lookup supporting YAML and JSON formats

Internationalization

items.title: Awesome Developer First
items.content_text:
### Reports Generation

*   [Carbone](https://carbone.io/) - JSON into PDF, DOCX, XLSX, PPTX, ODS... API.

Reports Generation

items.title: Awesome Engineering Team Management
items.content_text:
### Engineering / Systems Complexity

*   [SpaceX's 5-Step design and manufacturing process](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t705r8ICkRw\&t=13m30s) - ‚Äú1. Make requirement less dumb; 2. Try to delete parts; 3. Simplify or optimize; 4. Accelerate cycle time; 5. Automate‚Äù. See [full transcript](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=28517976).

### Re-organizations / Team-level

*   [Why it's difficult to build teams in high growth organisations](https://jchyip.medium.com/why-its-difficult-to-build-teams-in-high-growth-organisations-e1aee8446337) - Describes 3 different approach a manager can take to accommodate new people in the team: 1. Sink or Swim; 2. Split and Absorb; 3. Absorb and Split.
*   [Building a data team at a mid-stage startup: a short story](https://erikbern.com/2021/07/07/the-data-team-a-short-story.html) - Story of a manager trying to distill the concepts of a data-driven company while growing a tiny team of 3 people. Each step covers the evolution of the technical pipeline and interactions with existing stakeholders.
items.content_html:
Engineering / Systems Complexity

  • SpaceX's 5-Step design and manufacturing process - ‚Äú1. Make requirement less dumb; 2. Try to delete parts; 3. Simplify or optimize; 4. Accelerate cycle time; 5. Automate‚Äù. See full transcript.

Re-organizations / Team-level

  • Why it's difficult to build teams in high growth organisations - Describes 3 different approach a manager can take to accommodate new people in the team: 1. Sink or Swim; 2. Split and Absorb; 3. Absorb and Split.
  • Building a data team at a mid-stage startup: a short story - Story of a manager trying to distill the concepts of a data-driven company while growing a tiny team of 3 people. Each step covers the evolution of the technical pipeline and interactions with existing stakeholders.

items.title: Awesome Iam

### Authentication / Identifiers

*   [A Child's Garden of Inter-Service Authentication Schemes](https://web.archive.org/web/20200507173734/https://latacora.micro.blog/a-childs-garden/) - In the same spirit as above, but this time at the service level.
items.content_html:

items.title: Awesome Deno
items.content_text:
### Modules / Database

*   [dndb (‚≠ê75)](https://github.com/denyncrawford/dndb) - Persistent and embedable NoSQL database engine written for Deno ü¶ï.
*   [yongo (‚≠ê7)](https://github.com/yooneskh/yongo) - Subset of Mongoose api in deno (like populate) but will not fully copy mongoose

### Modules / Web utils

*   [graphql-tag (‚≠ê9)](https://github.com/deno-libs/graphql-tag) - GraphQL schema AST from template literal.
items.content_html:
Modules / Database

  • dndb (‚≠ê75) - Persistent and embedable NoSQL database engine written for Deno ü¶ï.
  • yongo (‚≠ê7) - Subset of Mongoose api in deno (like populate) but will not fully copy mongoose

Modules / Web utils

  • graphql-tag (‚≠ê9) - GraphQL schema AST from template literal.
